Interface GroupInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupClient

    public interface GroupInterface
    Interface describing the operations that must be supported by the client application used to talk with the group server. All methods must be implemented!

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserToken addUserToGroup(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String group, UserToken token)
      Adds a user to some group.
      UserToken createGroup(java.lang.String groupname, UserToken token)
      Creates a new group.
      boolean createUser(java.lang.String username, UserToken token)
      Creates a new user.
      UserToken deleteGroup(java.lang.String groupname, UserToken token)
      Deletes a group.
      boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String username, UserToken token)
      Deletes a user.
      UserToken deleteUserFromGroup(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String group, UserToken token)
      Removes a user from some group.
      UserToken getToken(java.lang.String username)
      Method used to get a token from the group server.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listMembers(java.lang.String group, UserToken token)
      Lists the members of a group.

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        UserToken getToken(java.lang.String username)
        Method used to get a token from the group server. Right now, there are no security checks.
        Parameters:
        username - The user whose token is being requested
        Returns:
        A UserToken describing the permissions of "username." If this user does not exist, a null value will be returned.

      • createUser

        boolean createUser(java.lang.String username,
                 UserToken token)
        Creates a new user. This method should only succeed if the user invoking it is a member of the special group "ADMIN".
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user to create
        token - The token of the user requesting the create operation
        Returns:
        true if the new user was created, false otherwise

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String username,
                 UserToken token)
        Deletes a user. This method should only succeed if the user invoking it is a member of the special group "ADMIN". Deleting a user should also remove him or her from all existing groups.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user to delete
        token - The token of the user requesting the delete operation
        Returns:
        true if the user was deleted, false otherwise

      • createGroup

        UserToken createGroup(java.lang.String groupname,
                    UserToken token)
        Creates a new group. Any user may create a group, provided that it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        groupname - The name of the group to create
        token - The token of the user requesting the create operation
        Returns:
        true if the new group was created, false otherwise

      • deleteGroup

        UserToken deleteGroup(java.lang.String groupname,
                    UserToken token)
        Deletes a group. This method should only succeed if the user invoking it is the user that originally created the group.
        Parameters:
        groupname - The name of the group to delete
        token - The token of the user requesting the delete operation
        Returns:
        true if the group was deleted, false otherwise

      • addUserToGroup

        UserToken addUserToGroup(java.lang.String user,
                       java.lang.String group,
                       UserToken token)
        Adds a user to some group. This method should succeed if the user invoking the operation is the owner of the group.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to add
        group - The name of the group to which user should be added
        token - The token of the user requesting the create operation
        Returns:
        true if the user was added, false otherwise

      • deleteUserFromGroup

        UserToken deleteUserFromGroup(java.lang.String user,
                            java.lang.String group,
                            UserToken token)
        Removes a user from some group. This method should succeed if the user invoking the operation is the owner of the group.
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user to remove
        group - The name of the group from which user should be removed
        token - The token of the user requesting the remove operation
        Returns:
        true if the user was removed, false otherwise

      • listMembers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> listMembers(java.lang.String group,
                                           UserToken token)
        Lists the members of a group. This method should only succeed if the user invoking the operation is the owner of the specified group.
        Parameters:
        group - The group whose membership list is requested
        token - The token of the user requesting the list
        Returns:
        A List of group members. Note that an empty list means a group has no members, while a null return indicates an error.
